alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Kershaw; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 8:56PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Fairfield, north central Richland and west central Kershaw Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 855 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Longtown, or 8 miles west of Lake Wateree Dam. This storm was nearly stationary. ...Boaters on Lake Wateree Should Seek Safe Harbor... HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Wateree Dam, Elgin, Lake Wateree State Park, Longtown, Lugoff, Ridgeway, Pine Grove Fire Station, Smallwood and Lake Wateree near Highway 97. This includes Interstate 77 near mile marker 31. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
